newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.57 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +2.57 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 27.169 to the dollar after Monday's fixing at 27.266, and at 17.718 to the mark from 17.682.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +2.57 percent, after a deviation of +2.58 on Monday.
When the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +2.53.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (0940 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated at 1130 CET.
